text: John Howard Coble (March 18, 1931 â€“ November 3, 2015) was an American politician. He served as a U.S. Representative for , serving from 1985 to 2015. He was a member of the Republican Party. Coble had skin cancer for many years. He was admitted to ICU in September 2015 after complications from skin cancer surgery. Coble died on November 3, 2015, in Greensboro, North Carolina at the age of 84 from complications of the surgery. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Profile at SourceWatch Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:American Presbyterians Category:Deaths from skin cancer Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Politicians from Greensboro, North Carolina Category:United States representatives from North Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States Coast Guard Category:Military people from North Carolina
title: Howard Coble
